content: Spyware
Very nice for backup

If you need a small notebook on cellphone to take quick notes.... this is it. I took 1 star off because navigating in the app is awkward. The back key also is the exit key (with a warning). The app would benifit with a better interface... IMHO

Very Good App. I'm probably using this in a way it wasn't intended for but it does it well. I write books on Kindle and although I wouldn't write a whole book on this, it is very handy when you have an odd 10 mins at work for some quick writing. I can easily do a couple of thousand words and then email it to myself for importing into Word on my main PC. Have been avid user for a year. Well worth the tiny cost Involved. Paid for version does far more and allows unlimited notes. Brilliant.

While the free version was great, the paid version is much greater. On my Moto G8 Power, with Android 9, the speech-to-text and the Read Aloud make it a dream editor for planning and for writing generally.

Good, not great. Good enough that I upgraded to the pay version, but the pay version really doesn't do much more than the free version. Settings really don't allow you to do much of anything. Update: thanks to the developer for responding to my criticism, and for correcting my error. For the low price, I definitely recommend the pro version.
replyContent: Hi, the Pro version allows unlimited number of notes and a host of other features. And we continue to add more features based on user feedback. Regarding the mentioned issue, it is a keyboard and OS feature, not the apps'. Please refer to the keyboard and spelling auto correct settings available under your phones' Language and Input section. Thanks

content: I used to rate this 5 stars... However, the more I use it, the clumsier it becomes to use. It has no proper sort feature (only manual sort) which is fine for a dozen or so notes. But when you get to hundreds of notes it becomes ridiculously hard to find the note you want. The search option does not work well, and is useless. Why? Because all search does is highlite notes in the list. You still have to scroll thru the list to find the note. The UI is terrible at best.
Just the wright application give it a try
WAY better than I dreamed, let alone expected!
For the pay version => üëçüëç
Util para utilizar no dia a dia.
Great app
Excellent
What a great little app! Easy to use,i use it for every thing.and another thing i like,No ads!
This is the most user-friendly note pad I've tried. I highly recommend this app!
works very well, will keep on using it for a long time.

I bought the paid version and have never been unsatisfied. There are a few glitches, like when a "note" becomes lengthy, and I want to add something, but the undo button undoes the error and everything works perfectly. The save option is excellent, if a device dies, so notes aren't lost. On one device I have upwards of 100 notes, and all organizable
Good enough that I got the pro version. Useful for all sorts of lists, note taking, quick reminders, or writing an email rough copy. Now I use it for most tasks that don't need a text editor.
Always need a note or two.
Simple, small, effective and intuitive. I am well pleased with all aspects of the app. Negligible "permissions" ... only those needed to function.

Congratulations to the developer. Well worth 5 stars. Doesn't need lots of steps to put the text in there, everything is instant, very easy, lots of customization, all friendly and very very useful!!! I really am grateful for this app üôè‚ù§Ô∏è
Simple and small but always reliable. Worth every penny.

Help, so I downloaded the application and have paid for it and cannot fix the voice. It's like a chipmunk speaking exteamly fast. Can you advise me. How to fix it after all I have purchased it and now it's useless if this is happening and it's extremely fast. Please advise thank you
replyContent: Hi Tanya, sorry to hear you are facing some issues. Please note that voice input and output are not directly provided by the app. Voice Input is handlef by your keyboard. The read aloud feature depends on the Text to Speech service available in your phone and its configuration. If you want a refund, please mail us. Thanks. support@panagola.com

content: Small useful memo pad. I use it for grocery lists, to do lists and current medications.
The Dev answers any questions you might have, thank you for making such a good app and being so helpful!

Unlike Google Doc trying to drag me into their cloud storage and hiding saved docs in hidden directories my phone, this app makes it easy for my printer apps to find, print, convert and edit. Works great!
Love the sort option. Like the checklist for groceries and shopping.
Awesome features. I really enjoy using the app
The language in the FAQs and in Settings is extremely clear and helpful. Some of the best I've ever seen. I will look for other apps by this publisher.
I've tried a lot of them. This is my favorite it should be urs.
Excellent little app on steroids. Paid version a touch extras included. 3 years later, very happy.

I absolutely love this app! I never go a day without perusing it. It helps keep my life organized, has lots of customizable options, easy to navigate, use friendly, & is my go to note pad\organizer. I started with the free version & then changed to the pro, it's inexpensive & very worth the small price. Don't be afraid to try it! ADD: 5/2020 I'm still loving this app! Easy to organize & keep multiple notes/files, no bugs, consistent performance, etc.
AMAZING AMAZING
It would be great if pro and password pro were the same.

I'm very happy with this app. I needed just a good, non-cloud, quick and dirty notepad with no adds and this paid version fits the bill perfectly. It takes a few minutes to catch on to how it works, but it's not hard and again, works great. For those times you need to jot something down that does not require a full blown office kind of document, this low-overhead wonder should make you happy.

Good for a grocery list but not much else due to stupendously bad interface. Once you get to a few dozen notes, sorting is almost impossible as you have to manually drag each note. Searching only highlights the notes and does not list them so you still have to manually scroll through the note list. The Note list is clumsy and keeps popping up by accidental taps. You have to use a different app to have security? Seriously?? This is a Pro app! Very, very bad interface. PLONK!

Used the free version for a long time and really liked it. Didn't really need the features in the Pro version, but I bought it anyway to show my support. I've tried lots of other notepad replacements but always kept coming back to this one. Thanks for this app.
Excellent so far. 2 days. Many nice unexpected features.
My review appears to have been deleted. I am extremely unhappy because these notes keep duplicating and triplicating themselves. I'm on the hunt for a replacement app.
replyContent:
Hi There, your review is very much active and we had already replied to it as below.
Please switch to the Beta version from here. https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.panagola.app.notepadpro
Please mail us if you still face the issue. support@panagola.com

content: Fantastic. Much better than Samsung notes, which is annoying because it keeps asking to sync. I do not want to sync. Notepad Pro is great and has a lot of useful features.
Great app, ability to back up to email. Excellent for note taking and recall!
Impressed with your free, no ads app, I saw the upgrade to pro version - had to get it. Thank you again. My hats off to you. üòéüëç
Opens fast! Which is extremely useful when an idea strikes. I've been using Notepad for sometime and wanted to try Pro. More notes are great and being able to sort them is marvelous.
Great job!

It's a really great app, well developed. I don't have enough room here to express the billions of things that this app can help you with. I am 60+ and use for many things everyday, groceries, reminders, notes for doctors. I even have one that's titled EMERGENCY and is locked for emergency EMT or police officer to be able to assist me. Thanks for sharing this great app.

Loving the app so far. Just wish there was a way to mark individual notes as read-only so I didn't accidentally edit them when I don't mean to. EDIT: Developer was quick to reply, added this feature and more! Perfect app! EDIT: My last review was from 2017 and this app is still fantastic so I'm updating it just to say so!
replyContent: Thank you for you feedback. We have added the ability to make notes read-only!

content: My experience is pretty good. The only thing is the the read-aloud Part is too fast.
Great. Please add bold and italic for texts. thx

It's has promise.. I wanted to share a file to pdf but got a msg to upgrade to notepad pro.. so I did. Then I find out this app won't export to pdf unless I upgrade to Adobe pro at $10 a month! This app did make it easy to uninstall and get a refund, but I lost all my work. :(
replyContent: PDF creation is not a feature of Notepad Pro. The amount quoted is probably shown by Adobe's PDF app that has no link to our app. If you just need to convert a note to pdf you can just install Google Cloud Print which is free and use the Save to PDF option. Hope you took a backup before uninstalling. Any doubts, please mail us. support@panagola.com

content: Simple and easy way to keep your thoughts on track. You don't get lost in the mechanics of formats. I love it and have used it for 2 or 3 years.
Extremely useful.

Love this app, I have the pro version. Something I'd like to see is the ability to select in the settings when you have a checklist, that the item checked off as completed would delete automatically. Or, that you could delete it manually. Right now you have to click at the end of the item and use backspace to overwrite it to delete it. If it is a long sentence you could select it and delete it etc. I still like the app and it is definitely worth purchasing it. It has a lot of useful features.
Keeps a good list safe

Its worth the pro version. It costs peanuts, and there are no ads, and its everything you need in a notepad. Protip, if you cant find something, look in the settings. That said, there definitely needs to be a better font size menu, i'd like to be able to make stuff smaller and set the font size with a number.
This is a good app,Use it every day.

userName: Shot Caller Magazine Director Marlon Green
content: Does it all
Performance excellent.

I really love this app but I cant get the export function to work. I just switched phones and need export all my notes so i can import them into the new phone but every time i try, the app just doesnt do anything.
replyContent: Exporting is easy. May be some notes are too large and hitting some Android limits for mailing. You could either use the backup option under Download menu to export it as a text file or export fewer notes at a time.  Please drop us a mail if you face further issues. We will be happy to help you out. support@panagola.com

content: Excellent
This is an outstanding app! Easy to use, and yet very powerful in it's use. I recommend it to anyone who has a need. Well done!
Excellent, speedy to use and very versatile
Great simple app
Essential piece of kit, as is their SafeNotes app. Best notepad around - use for everything, work and home

I've got to respond quickly to customers in web chat conversations from my phone (my chat window response area disappears instantly if they leave so I have to be fast). Most people ask the same FAQs. Notepad Pro has an always on display "copy" button that copies all the text in the note making this app the best one for my purpose. The search text feature is an absolute must have.
Nice, thanks does what it should
Very usable with many features
Simple powerful just fine app

I needed a functional, easy to use app, that would motivate me to stop using paper & to use my phone for creating notes, etc. In Notepad Pro I especially like its well thought out features, e.g., I can: send a note by email, back-up my files/work, lock my files, and use the search function to find any term or word contained in any note. The BEST PART, the app currently costs $1.49, less than a cup of coffee in my town (San Francisco).
Nothing special. Really not worth paying for pro version
Covers my needs very well, in that I'm old and need all the help I can get.

Excellent App, very customizable. Love the check boxes. One small bug - If you have an open file and your screen switches from portrait to landscape, the app will create a duplicate of the file. Go from portrait to landscape 10 times and you have 20 files with the same name, and the same information. Even with the bug, I use the program all the time for to do lists, grocery lists, and other things to remember.
I use this app often. Easy. Auto save on exit and first line text on main screen. Great job!

Liked it straight away and bought it about ten seconds after that. I write books for Amazon Kindle and my best ideas always seem to occur when I'm stuck at work. I needed something simple to use, yet reliable and rangey enough to do anything with no dramas. This works and it's excellent.
Yep! I bought after less than 3 minutes of use! Great App!
excelente!!!

Notepad has many great features. The layout is clean and intuitive. The backup option is sheer genius, unique and practical. However, I have a question. In the Notepad Pro sample screenshot on 'Play Store' titled 'Guava Nutrition Facts', how were the underlined words achieved? Also, in a future update, would it be possible to show the date and time each note was last edited.
replyContent: Hi Victor,Thanks! We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions! We will look at implementing them soon. Regarding the highlighted text in screenshot, it is a result of using the Search functionality. support@panagola.com

content: 10 Stars! I've been using this app (along with others of these developers) for a couple years, at least, and I have not one time been disappointed. Not once. Notepad pro performs exactly as promised, and does a lovely job. Beyond worth money for their pro versions. Keep up the outstanding work! ü§©

Simple, excellent. Bought the pro version. I tried and used many notepad apps til landing on this one. Beside working well, app has responsive Dev. The only odd thing is when opening a note that's been downloaded, there's no option to open that note with this app.

Very useful. Thank you
My personal filing cabinet. I use this every day, it keeps me so organized. Between my home, business and barn, I'm busy! I just love this app, it's my favorite. Highly recommend it.
Very useful for copying things from the web quickly and multiple note pages. In general, just an useful app and a great notepad replacement.
Just what I needed.
I absolutely love this app! Does exactly what I want it to do. No fuss, no mess, simple and easy to understand!
this is the best app for note taking. I have used this for 3+ years
Best memo/notepad EVER!!!
love it great app pro version has so much awsom features. super for on the the fly notes and blog updates

This app is good.
no icon: I installed the app and opened it after the install, I like what I see and how it works. however it did not install the app icon on my device, how can I get the icon ?
replyContent: That is unlikely. Try searching for Notepad Pro. Please mail us in case of issues. We will be happy to help you out. support@panagola.com

content: Notepad Pro is really good, Panagola should do a Sketch Pro in the same file cabinet style so I could buy that too.
Near perfect. Quick, easy, and you can save to text file. The title/first-line concept is brilliant!
best note' app of the lot
versatile, fantastic list of settings and options
Love it. Basic yet perfect. Well done xx

So easy to cut and past good to know infermation from many sources and make it titled for quick finding later !!! No limit to it's uses - imagination expanding new things !!! Pro just makes it even better!!!

i use it for my grocery lists, my scheduled rides & important appointments, recipes, things to do or look up, etc. i thought i would need fonts etc but you really don't when all you want to do is keep track fast of important things in your life like walking out of the room while your mom tells you to buy milk. It has 12 slots with each slot reusable. It NEVER crashes!! i bought the pro version since I've had the free version for so long to find it useful. And no large moving annoying ads!!

I use a microphone blocking app that records all attempts to access the microphone. Notepad Pro does not ask for microphone permission in Android settings, but whenever I start Notepad Pro, I see it accesses the microphone. None of my other apps are acting this way. I use Google Gboard keyboard, which does not access the microphone or ask for permission, so please provide a more believable explaination why Notepad Pro accesses my microphone without informing me.
replyContent: Sorry Sir/Madam. We have no idea about the odd behavior in your phone. All we know is that the Notepad Pro app does not use microphone. Google keyboard might be a system app and does not need you to provide any permissions. support@panagola.com

content: This is the perfect little notepad for me. It works great if you just want to make short little list and such. It's extremely well put together. I can't say how much I love this notepad. I never even use the other ones I have downloaded in the past. Thanks for such a great app.

love this app

amazing APP

content: Great App

Best app ever for keeping notes. Very Quick to use. Organized efficiently with multiple sorting options, so easy to store & find info quickly. Good editing tools, excellent back up tools with auto or manual b/u to email and it is easy to use intuitive friendly

This is a very good app. I use it constantly for everything from Grocery Shopping, to quick reminders. The one feature I wish it had is the ability to import notes from a txt file or other format directly, I found a way to open txt files but, it is a round about way that takes a bit of work.

replyContent: All features you mention are present - sorting, categorizing, search, export etc. Either open the menu once or mail us so we can explain.

This was very important to me, and I appreciate the responsiveness of the developer. Kudos!
replyContent: Thank you! Happy to know that the update has helped.

content: I agree with everyone who has given this app high ratings, I use it all the time definitely recommend pro version, only one thing l hope you could help me with is I use voice to text alot on the go and creating lists require opening and closing the mic . A enter button to line down in the tool bar would be appreciated, thanks your doing great work maybe we should simply convince Google to add an enter botton to the mic in their key board app I could find that useful with lots of apps
replyContent:
Thank you very much! Please try saying New Paragraph for enter. Google Voice Typing is being constantly improved by Google. Please refer to the following help page:
https://support.google.com/docs/answer/4492226?hl=en

content: Great app

What a great little app! I use this more than anything else on my phone, its simple, uses virtually no system resources, versatile enough to be very useful . . . and so reasonably priced. The developer really needs to be shown more support! Thanks for a great job guys.
replyContent: Thanks a lot for the nice words and encouragement!

content: I tried several note /memo apps until I tried the free version of this app. Upgraded to pro version to support the developer.
Does what it says without any unnecessary bulls**t. If you want a simple note pad this is it. No ads=A+. No permissions needed =A+. Thanks for a great app.
The free one is excellent also but for a buck you get so much more
Lot of functions including export sd card and Google drive

I had the original notepad and found everything, from the color scheme to the toolbars, etc. to be so perfect I bought the pro version! However I wish there were more organisation options. Perhaps leave an option in Settings to keep the little note widget as is, but provide in the settings a way to alter the number of columns in the widget (e.g. reduce the note columns to one instead of two, increase it to three, etc.) and perhaps that would allow us, when the note columns are not locked, to move the notes.
replyContent: Many thanks for your suggestions. We will look at providing more config options like you mentioned.

content: Fast with no overhead, Does what it is elegantly designed for. No BLOAT!!! Recommended Highly. Deserves far more downloads
Any plans to add the ability to display a notes' contents as a widget?  I'd like to see this feature, as I find it handy when making lists and such. No need to launch the app to see the list.
replyContent: Thank you for the suggestion. We will look into the possibility of doing this.

content: I really like this app, it's simple and organizes things well. I do wish there was more customization- changing the fonts or the color of the background. A widget would be nice too. But even without all that it's great.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added more customization options and color themes. Please upgrade to Ver 1.5.

content: I didn't need the Pro version but wanted to support the developer.
No bloat, no data harvesting. Just something you can rely on really. Also the l last couple updates were perfect.
To make room for the keyboard, it scrolls up, and you cannot see what you're editing, deleting, it writing. You find yourself stopping and looking and getting frustrated.
replyContent: Many Thanks for your feedback. We have corrected the mentioned issue as well as added several new features. Please upgrade to the latest version and let us know in case of any issues.

content: I've been using the free version for quite a while now and immediately upgraded to pro when I saw it was available. Perfect for people that consistently forget to save data.
Great notepad.
